FileLink.description: Provides information for the file link.

Href.description:
The "href" attribute contains the link's IRI. atom:link elements MUST
have an href attribute, whose value MUST be a IRI reference

Rel.description:
atom:link elements MAY have a "rel" attribute that indicates the link
relation type.  If the "rel" attribute is not present, the link
element MUST be interpreted as if the link relation type is "alternate".

Type.description:
On the link element, the "type" attribute's value is an advisory
media type: it is a hint about the type of the representation that is
expected to be returned when the value of the href attribute is
dereferenced.  Note that the type attribute does not override the
actual media type returned with the representation.

Title.description:
The "title" attribute conveys human-readable information about the
link.  The content of the "title" attribute is Language-Sensitive.

Link.description:
Provides information for the object link.
This is supposed to be an atom:link, therefore it should have all attributes specified here http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4287#section-4.2.7

LoadWebDocumentData.description: Contains data for load web document

ColorMode.description:
Gets or sets a value determining how colors are rendered.
{ Normal | Grayscale}

DmlRenderingMode.description:
Gets or sets a value determining how DrawingML shapes are rendered.
{ Fallback | DrawingML }

DmlEffectsRenderingMode.description:
Gets or sets a value determining how DrawingML effects are rendered.
{ Simplified | None | Fine }

ZipOutput.description:
Controls zip output or not.
Default value is false.

UpdateSdtContent.description: Gets or sets value determining whether content of  is updated before saving.

UpdateFields.description:
Gets or sets a value determining if fields should be updated before saving the document to a fixed page format.
Default value for this property is true

SaveOptionsData.description: base container class for save options data

SaveRoutingSlip.description: Determine whether or not save RoutingSlip data saved to output document

DocSaveOptionsData.description: container class for doc/dot save options

BmpSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for bmp save options.

GraphicsQualityOptions.description: Allows to specify additional System.Drawing.Graphics quality options.

Resolution.description:
Sets both horizontal and vertical resolution for the generated images, in dots per inch.

This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is 96.

HorizontalResolution.description:
Gets or sets the horizontal resolution for the generated images, in dots per inch.

This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is 96.

VerticalResolution.description:
Gets or sets the vertical resolution for the generated images, in dots per inch.

This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is 96.

UseHighQualityRendering.description: Determine whether or not to use high quality (i.e. slow) rendering algorithms

UseAntiAliasing.description: Determine whether or not to use anti-aliasing for rendering

UseGdiEmfRenderer.description: Gets or sets a value determining whether to use GDI+ or Aspose.Words metafile renderer when saving to EMF.

ImageSaveOptionsData.description: Container abstract class for image save options

CompositingMode.description: Gets or sets a value that specifies how composited images are drawn to this Graphics.

CompositingQuality.description: Gets or sets the rendering quality of composited images drawn to this Graphics.

InterpolationMode.description: Gets or sets the interpolation mode associated with this Graphics.

SmoothingMode.description: Gets or sets the rendering quality for this Graphics.

StringFormat.description: Gets or sets text layout information (such as alignment, orientation and tab stops) display manipulations (such as ellipsis insertion and national digit substitution) and OpenType features.

TextRenderingHint.description: Gets or sets the rendering mode for text associated with this Graphics.

GraphicsQualityOptionsData.description: Allows to specify additional System.Drawing.Graphics quality options.

Alignment.description: Gets or sets horizontal alignment of the string.

FormatFlags.description: Gets or sets a System.Drawing.StringFormatFlags enumeration that contains formatting information.

HotkeyPrefix.description: Gets or sets the System.Drawing.Text.HotkeyPrefix object for this System.Drawing.StringFormat object.

LineAlignment.description: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the string.

Trimming.description: Gets or sets the System.Drawing.StringTrimming enumeration for this System.Drawing.StringFormat object.

JpegQuality.description: Determines the quality of the JPEG images inside PDF document.

MetafileRenderingOptions.description: Allows to specify metafile rendering options.

NumeralFormat.description: Indicates the symbol set that is used to represent numbers while rendering to fixed page formats

OptimizeOutput.description:
Flag indicates whether it is required to optimize output of XPS. 
If this flag is set redundant nested canvases and empty canvases are removed, also neighbor glyphs with the same formatting are concatenated. 
Note: The accuracy of the content display may be affected if this property is set to true.  Default is false.

PageCount.description: Determines number of pages to render

PageIndex.description: Determines 0-based index of the first page to render

FixedPageSaveOptionsData.description: Contains common options that can be specified when saving a document into fixed page formats (PDF, XPS, SWF, images etc).

EmfPlusDualRenderingMode.description: Determines how EMF+ Dual metafiles should be rendered

RenderingMode.description: Determines how metafile images should be rendered

UseEmfEmbeddedToWmf.description: Determines how WMF metafiles with embedded EMF metafiles should be rendered

MetafileRenderingOptionsData.description: container class for options of metafile rendering

EmfSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for emf save options.

JpegSaveOptionsData.description: container class for jpeg save options.

GifSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for gif save options.

PngSaveOptionsData.description: container class for png save options.

TiffBinarizationMethod.description: Specifies method used while converting images to 1 bpp format.

TiffSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for tiff save options.

EpubNavigationMapLevel.description: Specifies the maximum level of headings populated to the navigation map when exporting

EpubSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for epub save options.

PrettyFormat.description: Specifies whether or not use pretty formats output

AllowNegativeIndent.description: Specifies whether negative left and right indents of paragraphs are allowed (not normalized)

CssStyleSheetFileName.description: Specifies the name of the CSS file written when the document is exported to HTML

CssStyleSheetType.description: Specifies how CSS styles are exported

DocumentSplitCriteria.description: Specifies how the document should be split when saving

DocumentSplitHeadingLevel.description: Specifies the maximum level of headings at which to split the document

Encoding.description: Specifies the encoding to use when exporting

ExportDocumentProperties.description: Specifies whether to export built-in and custom document properties

ExportFontsAsBase64.description: Specifies whether fonts resources should be embedded to HTML in Base64 encoding.  Default is false.

ExportFontResources.description: Specifies whether font resources should be exported

ExportHeadersFootersMode.description: Specifies how headers and footers are output

ExportImagesAsBase64.description: Specifies whether images are saved in Base64 format

ExportLanguageInformation.description: Specifies whether language information is exported

ExportListLabels.description: Controls how list labels are output

ExportMetafileAsRaster.description: Specifies whether to convert metafiles into raster images when exporting

ExportOriginalUrlForLinkedImages.description:
Specifies whether original URL should be used as the URL of the linked images.
Default value is false.

ExportPageMargins.description:
Specifies whether page margins is exported to HTML, MHTML or EPUB.
Default is false.

ExportPageSetup.description: Specifies whether page setup is exported

ExportRelativeFontSize.description: Specifies whether font sizes should be output in relative units when saving

ExportRoundtripInformation.description:
Specifies whether to write the roundtrip information when saving to HTML
Default value is true.

ExportTextBoxAsSvg.description:
Controls how textboxes represented by Aspose.Words.Drawing.Shape are saved to HTML, MHTML or EPUB. Default value is false.

  When set to true, exports textboxes as inline "svg" elements. When false, exports as "image" elements.

ExportTextInputFormFieldAsText.description: Controls how text input form fields are saved

ExportTocPageNumbers.description: Specifies whether to write page numbers to table of contents when saving

ExportXhtmlTransitional.description: Specifies whether to write the DOCTYPE declaration when saving

FontsFolder.description: Specifies the physical folder where fonts are saved when exporting a document

FontsFolderAlias.description: Specifies the name of the folder used to construct font URIs

FontResourcesSubsettingSizeThreshold.description: Controls which font resources need subsetting when saving

HtmlVersion.description:
Specifies version of HTML standard that should be used when saving the document to HTML or MHTML.  
Default value is Aspose.Words.Saving.HtmlVersion.Xhtml.

ImagesFolder.description: Specifies the physical folder where images are saved when exporting a document

ImagesFolderAlias.description: Specifies the name of the folder used to construct image URIs

ImageResolution.description: Specifies the output resolution for images when exporting

OfficeMathOutputMode.description: Controls how OfficeMath objects are exported to HTML, MHTML or EPUB.  Default value is HtmlOfficeMathOutputMode.Image.

ResourceFolder.description: Specifies a physical folder where all resources like images, fonts, and external CSS are saved when a document is exported to HTML. Default is an empty string.

ResourceFolderAlias.description: Specifies the name of the folder used to construct URIs of all resources written into an HTML document.  Default is an empty string.

ScaleImageToShapeSize.description: Specifies whether images are scaled by Aspose.Words to the bounding shape size when exporting

TableWidthOutputMode.description: Controls how table, row and cell widths are exported

ExportDropDownFormFieldAsText.description:
Controls how drop-down form fields are saved to HTML.
Default value is false.

HtmlSaveOptionsData.description: container class for html save options

CssClassNamesPrefix.description:
Specifies prefix which is added to all class names in style.css file.
Default value is "aw".

ExportEmbeddedCss.description: Specifies whether the CSS (Cascading Style Sheet) should be embedded into Html document.

ExportEmbeddedFonts.description: Specifies whether fonts should be embedded into Html document in Base64 format.

ExportEmbeddedImages.description: Specifies whether images should be embedded into Html document in Base64 format.

ExportFormFields.description: Gets or sets indication of whether form fields are exported as interactive items (as 'input' tag) rather than converted to text or graphics.

ResourcesFolder.description: Specifies the physical folder where resources are saved when exporting a document

ResourcesFolderAlias.description: Specifies the name of the folder used to construct resource URIs

ShowPageBorder.description: Specifies whether border around pages should be shown.

PageHorizontalAlignment.description:
Specifies the horizontal alignment of pages in an HTML document.
Default value is HtmlFixedHorizontalPageAlignment.Center.

PageMargins.description:
Specifies the margins around pages in an HTML document.
The margins value is measured in points and should be equal to or greater than 0.
Default value is 10 points.

HtmlFixedSaveOptionsData.description: container class for fixed html save options

MhtmlSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for mhtml save options.

PrettyFormat.description: Specifies whether or not use pretty formats output

IsStrictSchema11.description: Specifies whether export should correspond to ODT specification 1.1 strictly

OdtSaveOptionsData.description: container class for odt/ott save options

PrettyFormat.description: Specifies whether or not use pretty formats output

Compliance.description: Specifies the OOXML version for the output document

Password.description: Specifies a password to encrypt document using ECMA376 Standard encryption algorithm

OoxmlSaveOptionsData.description: container class for docx/docm/dotx/dotm/flatopc save options

BookmarksOutlineLevel.description: Specifies the level in the PDF document outline at which to display Word bookmarks

CreateNoteHyperlinks.description:
Specifies whether to convert footnote/endnote references in main text story into active hyperlinks.
When clicked the hyperlink will lead to the corresponding footnote/endnote.
Default is false.

Compliance.description: Specifies the PDF standards compliance level for output documents

DigitalSignatureDetails.description: Specifies the details for signing the output PDF document

DisplayDocTitle.description: A flag specifying whether the window’s title bar should display the document title taken from the Title entry of the document information dictionary.

DownsampleImages.description: Specifies whether or not the images should be downsampled

DownsampleResolution.description: Specifies the resolution in pixels per inch to which the images should be downsampled

EmbedFullFonts.description: Controls how fonts are embedded into the resulting PDF documents

EmbedStandardWindowsFonts.description: Determines whether or not to embed standard windows fonts Arial and Times New Roman

EncryptionDetails.description: Specifies the details for encrypting the output PDF document

ExpandedOutlineLevels.description: Specifies how many levels in the PDF document outline to show expanded when the PDF file is viewed

ExportCustomPropertiesAsMetadata.description: Determines whether or not to export custom properties of document as Metadata

ExportDocumentStructure.description: Determines whether or not to export document structure

HeadingsOutlineLevels.description: Specifies how many levels of headings (paragraphs formatted with the Heading styles) to include in the PDF document outline

ImageCompression.description: Specifies compression type to be used for all images in the document

OpenHyperlinksInNewWindow.description: Determines whether hyperlinks in the output Pdf document are forced to be opened in a new window (or tab) of a browser

PageMode.description: Specifies how the PDF document should be displayed when opened in the PDF reader

ImageColorSpaceExportMode.description: Specifies how the color space will be selected for the images in PDF document.

PreserveFormFields.description: Specifies whether to preserve Microsoft Word form fields as form fields in PDF or convert them to text

TextCompression.description: Specifies compression type to be used for all textual content in the document

UseCoreFonts.description: Determines whether or not to substitute TrueType fonts Arial, Times New Roman, Courier New and Symbol with core PDF Type 1 fonts

UseBookFoldPrintingSettings.description: Determines whether the document should be saved using a booklet printing layout

ZoomBehavior.description: Determines what type of zoom should be applied when a document is opened with a PDF viewer

ZoomFactor.description: Determines zoom factor (in percentages) for a document

CustomPropertiesExport.description:
Gets or sets a value determining the way  are exported to PDF file.
Default value is .

PreblendImages.description: Gets or sets a value determining whether or not to preblend transparent images with black background color.

PdfSaveOptionsData.description: container class for pdf save options

PdfDigitalSignatureDetailsData.description: container class for details of digital signature

DownsampleImages.description: Specifies whether images should be downsampled.

Resolution.description: Specifies the resolution in pixels per inch which the images should be downsampled to.

ResolutionThreshold.description:
Specifies the threshold resolution in pixels per inch.
If resolution of an image in the document is less than threshold value, 
the downsampling algorithm will not be applied.
A value of 0 means the threshold check is not used and all images that can be reduced in size are downsampled.

EncryptionAlgorithm.description: Specifies the encryption algorithm to use

OwnerPassword.description: Specifies the owner password for the encrypted PDF document

Permissions.description: Specifies the operations that are allowed to a user on an encrypted PDF document

UserPassword.description: Specifies the user password required for opening the encrypted PDF document

PdfEncryptionDetailsData.description: container class for details of encryption

BookmarksOutlineLevels.description: Allows to specify individual bookmarks outline level

DefaultBookmarksOutlineLevel.description: Specifies the default level in the document outline at which to display Word bookmarks

ExpandedOutlineLevels.description: Specifies how many levels in the document outline to show expanded when the file is viewed

HeadingsOutlineLevels.description: Specifies how many levels of headings (paragraphs formatted with the Heading styles) to include in the document outline

BookmarksOutlineLevelData.description: container class for individual bookmarks outline level

FalllbackFontName.description: Name of the font that will be used if no expected font is found in printer and built-in fonts collections.

RasterizeTransformedElements.description: Gets or sets a value determining whether or not complex transformed elements should be rasterized before saving to PCL document.  Default is true.

PclSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for pcl save options

UseBookFoldPrintingSettings.description: Determines whether the document should be saved using a booklet printing layout

PsSaveOptionsData.description: container class for ps save options

PrettyFormat.description: Specifies whether or not use pretty formats output

ExportCompactSize.description: Allows to make output RTF documents smaller in size, but if they contain RTL (right-to-left) text, it will not be displayed correctly

ExportImagesForOldReaders.description: Specifies whether the keywords for "old readers" are written to RTF or not

RtfSaveOptionsData.description: container class for rtf save options

ExportEmbeddedImages.description: Specified whether images should be embedded into SVG document as base64

FitToViewPort.description: Specifies if the output SVG should fill the available viewport area (browser window or container). When set to true width and height of output SVG are set to 100%.

ResourcesFolder.description: Specifies the physical folder where resources (images) are saved when exporting

ResourcesFolderAlias.description: Specifies the name of the folder used to construct image URIs

TextOutputMode.description: Determines how text should be rendered

SvgSaveOptionsData.description: container class for svg save options

BookmarksOutlineLevel.description: Specifies the level in the SWF document outline at which to display Word bookmarks

Compressed.description: Specifies whether the generated SWF document should be compressed or not

ExpandedOutlineLevels.description: Specifies how many levels in the SWF document outline to show expanded when the SWF file is viewed

HeadingsOutlineLevels.description: Specifies how many levels of headings (paragraphs formatted with the Heading styles) to include in the SWF document outline

LeftPaneControlFlags.description: Control flags used to configure appearance of left panel of SWF viewer

LogoImageBytes.description: Image that will be displayed as logo in the top right corner of the viewer as string in base64 format

LogoLink.description: Specifies the full hyperlink address for a logo

ShowPageBorder.description: Specifies whether border around pages should be shown

ToolTipsFontName.description: Specifies a font used for tooltips in SWF viewer

TopPaneControlFlags.description: Control flags used to configure appearance of top panel of SWF viewer

ViewerIncluded.description: Specifies whether the generated SWF document should include the integrated document viewer or not

SwfSaveOptionsData.description: container class for swf save options

Encoding.description: Specifies the encoding to use when exporting in plain text format

ExportHeadersFooters.description: Specifies whether to output headers and footers when exporting in plain text format

ForcePageBreaks.description:
Allows to specify whether the page breaks should be preserved during export.
The default value is false.

ParagraphBreak.description: Specifies the string to use as a paragraph break when exporting in plain text format

PreserveTableLayout.description: Specifies whether the program should attempt to preserve layout of tables when saving in the plain text format

SimplifyListLabels.description: Specifies whether the program should simplify list labels in case of complex label formatting not being adequately represented by plain text

TextSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for text save options.

PrettyFormat.description: Specifies whether or not use pretty formats output

WordMLSaveOptionsData.description: container class for wml save options

ResourcesFolder.description:
Specifies the physical folder where resources (images and fonts) are saved when exporting a document to fixed page Xaml format.
Default is null.

ResourcesFolderAlias.description:
Specifies the name of the folder used to construct image URIs written into an fixed page Xaml document.
Default is null.

XamlFixedSaveOptionsData.description: container class for xaml fixed save options

ImagesFolder.description: Specifies the physical folder where images are saved when exporting

ImagesFolderAlias.description: Specifies the name of the folder used to construct image URIs

XamlFlowSaveOptionsData.description: container class for xaml flow save options

BookmarksOutlineLevel.description: Specifies the level in the XPS document outline at which to display Word bookmarks.

HeadingsOutlineLevels.description: Specifies how many levels of headings (paragraphs formatted with the Heading styles) to include in the XPS document outline.

UseBookFoldPrintingSettings.description: Determines whether the document should be saved using a booklet printing layout

XpsSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for xps save options.

AdditionalItems.description: Links to additional items (css, images etc).
